Description of incident: The theft of a password-protected laptop from an employee's car may have resulted in the exposure of patient information.  The theft occurred on January 4, 2013 and was reported immediately.  Patients who were treated between July 1, 2006 and January 3, 2013 may have had their names, Social Security numbers, addresses, phone numbers, dates of birth, insurance policy numbers, diagnoses, visit notes, physician names, caregiver names, and advance directives exposed.
